summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3969 for the improvement of Montlake Boulevard, from end of existing paving north of Pike's Reserve for canal, to Lake Washington Canal by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48354 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
